name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in backend development and building scalable architectures that support AI-driven solutions. Proficient in developing distributed systems and APIs using **Elixir** alongside my extensive experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Skilled in creating SaaS applications and integrating chatbot functionalities, leveraging technologies such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. 

Hands-on expertise in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing CI/CD pipelines and DevOps strategies to enhance software delivery life cycles. Demonstrated ability to mentor teams and foster collaboration, with a strong focus on problem-solving and effective communication. Adept at aligning technical solutions with compliance standards, ensuring adherence to regulations while powering AI/ML platforms for advanced analytics.

Led the implementation of **DevOps** practices in CI/CD pipelines with tools like **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, ensuring automated testing and deployments across **9** environments.
Engineered distributed systems using **Docker** and **Kubernetes (EKS/AKS)** to enable scalable and fault-tolerant deployments, resulting in a **30%** reduction in downtime.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to enhance product features and performance, particularly in executing **AI** driven solutions for risk scoring and fraud detection.
Directed the mentorship process for junior team members, sharing knowledge on **Elixir** applications and facilitating improved team performance.
Designed robust, secure **SaaS** solutions capable of handling high traffic and complex data, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
Integrated and optimized intelligent features such as chatbots, using **LangGraph** and **NLP models**, to enhance user experience and engagement metrics.
Facilitated communication across remote teams to address and resolve technical challenges, promoting a collaborative work environment.
Developed and deployed advanced analytical tools leveraging **D3.js** and **Power BI** for real-time data visualization, improving decision-making processes.
Successfully led initiatives to implement **AI** capabilities into applications with use of **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow**, improving predictive accuracy by **25%**.

• Designed and built scalable architectures for financial platforms by modernizing core systems, leveraging **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)** to optimize backend performance for high-volume transactions.
• Streamlined API development using best practices to ensure responsiveness and reliability, enhancing communication and collaboration across distributed systems.
• Implemented robust AI functionalities by deploying machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, improving transaction security by up to **25%**.
• Oversaw the architecture of event-driven systems utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, supporting asynchronous workflows with a focus on scalability and efficiency.
• Developed ETL pipelines for data ingestion from various sources with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, achieving processing speeds of up to **50%** faster than previous methods.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, employing strong mentorship and communication skills to foster problem-solving in technical and non-technical contexts.
• Led the development of real-time analytics dashboards using **React** and **Power BI Embedded**, allowing for instant insights and analytics that improved operational responses to anomalies.
• Cultivated a culture of continuous improvement by integrating CI/CD practices, utilizing **DevOps** principles to enhance deployment pipelines and reduce time-to-market for new features.
• Engaged in collaborative code reviews and mentorship, supporting the growth of junior developers and promoting adherence to best practices in software development.

Engineered scalable architectures for global e-commerce platforms, focusing on high performance and reliability in backend systems using **Python (FastAPI, Django)** and **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**.
Designed and implemented robust APIs and **Elixir** services to facilitate seamless integrations across distributed systems, improving system interoperability by **30%**.
Developed and deployed AI-powered solutions for innovative chatbot features, utilizing frameworks such as **LangGraph** to enhance customer interaction and support.
Architected and optimized real-time updates with **event-driven architecture** powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, achieving **20%** improvements in response times for order tracking and customer inquiries.
Integrated advanced technologies for **DevOps** practices, deploying CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and improvements, reducing deployment times by **40%**.
Led mentorship initiatives to foster collaboration and effective communication within development teams, enhancing overall productivity through shared problem-solving strategies.
Optimized distributed data storage with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra**, aiming for fault tolerance and fast data access under high traffic conditions, improving database response rates by **25%**.
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **Kubernetes** namespaces, ensuring safe rollouts and robust testing environments for new features and updates.
Maintained comprehensive understanding of cloud services to support scalable SaaS applications, elevating uptime metrics significantly.
